sql.trim: id, org_number, name, org_account, org_password, context, capital, up_time, city, icp_filing, representative, contact, platform_ico, platformlist_ico, platform_detail_img, business_license, recommend, grade, top, homepage_sort, status, remark, create_time, update_time, min_profit, max_profit, min_fee_ratio, max_fee_ratio, min_dead_line, max_dead_line, dead_line_min_self_defined, dead_line_max_self_defined, org_url, org_product_url, org_usercenter_url, org_bind_user_url, org_user_exist_url, org_userbalance_url, trusteeship, org_profile, org_security, org_fee_ratio, org_fee_type, org_amount_limit, org_investdeadline_limit, org_creator, org_updater, org_isstaticproduct, org_advertisement, org_investigation_report, org_margin, org_advantage, org_tag, org_product_tag, org_gray_status,

mapper.select: select from tcim_org_info where 1=1
select from tcim_org_info where 1=1
select org_product_url, org_usercenter_url from tcim_org_info where org_number = #{orgNo}

mapper.update:
UPDATE tcim_org_info
name = #{name},
org_password = #{orgPassword},
context = #{context},
capital = #{capital},
up_time = #{upTime},
city = #{city},
icp_filing = #{icpFiling},
representative = #{representative},
contact = #{contact},
platform_ico = #{platformIco},
platformlist_ico = #{platformlistIco},
platform_detail_img = #{platformDetailImg},
business_license = #{businessLicense},
recommend = #{recommend},
grade = #{grade},
top = #{top},
homepage_sort = #{homepageSort},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
min_profit = #{minProfit},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
min_fee_ratio = #{minFeeRatio},
max_fee_ratio = #{maxFeeRatio},
min_dead_line = #{minDeadLine},
max_dead_line = #{maxDeadLine},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
org_url = #{orgUrl},
org_product_url = #{orgProductUrl},
org_usercenter_url = #{orgUsercenterUrl},
org_bind_user_url = #{orgBindUserUrl},
org_userbalance_url = #{orgUserbalanceUrl},
trusteeship = #{trusteeship},
org_profile = #{orgProfile},
org_security = #{orgSecurity},
org_fee_ratio = #{orgFeeRatio},
org_fee_type = #{orgFeeType},
org_amount_limit = #{orgAmountLimit},
org_investdeadline_limit = #{orgInvestdeadlineLimit},
org_margin = #{orgMargin},
org_investigation_report = #{orgInvestigationReport},
org_advantage = #{orgAdvantage},
org_tag = #{orgTag},
org_product_tag = #{orgProductTag},
id = #{id}

UPDATE tcim_org_info
name = #{name},
org_account = #{orgAccount},
org_password = #{orgPassword},
context = #{context},
capital = #{capital},
up_time = #{upTime},
city = #{city},
icp_filing = #{icpFiling},
representative = #{representative},
contact = #{contact},
platform_ico = #{platformIco},
platformlist_ico = #{platformlistIco},
platform_detail_img = #{platformDetailImg},
business_license = #{businessLicense},
recommend = #{recommend},
grade = #{grade},
top = #{top},
homepage_sort = #{homepageSort},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
min_profit = #{minProfit},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
min_fee_ratio = #{minFeeRatio},
max_fee_ratio = #{maxFeeRatio},
min_dead_line = #{minDeadLine},
max_dead_line = #{maxDeadLine},
dead_line_min_self_defined = #{deadLineMinSelfDefined},
dead_line_max_self_defined = #{deadLineMaxSelfDefined},
org_url = #{orgUrl},
org_product_url = #{orgProductUrl},
org_usercenter_url = #{orgUsercenterUrl},
org_bind_user_url = #{orgBindUserUrl},
org_userbalance_url = #{orgUserbalanceUrl},
org_user_exist_url = #{orgUserExistUrl},
trusteeship = #{trusteeship},
org_profile = #{orgProfile},
org_security = #{orgSecurity},
org_fee_type = #{orgFeeType},
org_amount_limit = #{orgAmountLimit},
org_investdeadline_limit = #{orgInvestdeadlineLimit},
org_creator = #{orgCreator},
org_updater = #{orgUpdater},
org_isstaticproduct = #{orgIsstaticproduct},
org_advertisement = #{orgAdvertisement},
org_advertisement_url = #{orgAdvertisementUrl},
org_margin = #{orgMargin},
org_investigation_report = #{orgInvestigationReport},
org_investigation_report_url = #{orgInvestigationReportUrl},
org_advantage = #{orgAdvantage},
org_tag = #{orgTag},
org_product_tag = #{orgProductTag},
org_invest_strategy = #{orgInvestStrategy},
org_planner_strategy = #{orgPlannerStrategy},
org_invest_tag = #{orgInvestTag},
org_planner_tag = #{orgPlannerTag},
org_planner_product_tag = #{orgPlannerProductTag},
org_honor = #{orgHonor},
org_gray_status = #{orgGrayStatus},
org_joint_type = #{orgJoinType},
org_newest_img = #{orgNewestImg},
org_debenture_transfer = #{orgDebentureTransfer},
org_bid_security = #{orgBidSecurity},
org_security_mode = #{orgSecurityMode},
org_website_records = #{orgWebsiteRecords},
org_contact_details = #{orgContactDetails},
pc_platform_img = #{pcPlatformImg},
pc_platform_list_img = #{pcPlatformListImg},
pc_platform_detail_img = #{pcPlatformDetailImg},
diff_fee_ratio = #{diffFeeRatio},
cooperation_end_url = #{cooperationEndUrl},
org_number = #{orgNumber}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tcim_org_info
name LIKE CONCAT('%','${dt.search.value}','%' )
${item.name} ${item.dir}

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platform_ico,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.org_url, o.platformlist_ico, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_fee_ratio, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1
AND o.city NOT IN
#{cty.configValue}
AND o.city LIKE CONCAT('%','${city}','%' )
AND o.context LIKE CONCAT('%','${background}','%' )
AND o.grade ${securityLevel}
AND ( (o.min_dead_line <= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line >= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.min_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.min_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.max_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) OR (o.min_dead_line >= #{minDeadLine} AND o.max_dead_line <= #{maxDeadLine}) )
AND ( (o.min_profit <= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit >= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.min_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.min_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.max_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) OR (o.min_profit >= #{minYearProfit} AND o.max_profit <= #{maxYearProfit}) )
GROUP BY o.org_number ORDER BY o.top

SELECT t.org_number, t.`name`,
CASE t.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
t.org_url, t.context, t.capital, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.up_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.platform_detail_img, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.dead_line_max_self_defined, t.dead_line_min_self_defined, t.org_fee_type, t.org_amount_limit, t.org_investdeadline_limit, t.org_isstaticproduct, t1.org_icon, t1.org_membergrade, t1.org_membername, t1.org_describe FROM tcim_org_info t LEFT JOIN tcim_org_memberinfo t1
ON t.id = t1.orgid WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNo}

SELECT org_number,name,org_url,platform_ico FROM tcim_org_info
WHERE recommend = #{recommend} AND `status` = 1 AND homepage_sort IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY homepage_sort LIMIT 10

SELECT o.org_number, o.name,
CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.platformlist_ico, o.min_fee_ratio, o.max_fee_ratio, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, o.org_advertisement, COUNT(p.org_number) usable_product_nums FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product p ON o.org_number = p.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND o.recommend = 1 AND o.homepage_sort IS NOT NULL GROUP BY o.org_number ORDER BY o.homepage_sort LIMIT 8

SELECT o.org_number, o.name, o.platformlist_ico, o.org_profile, CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade
FROM tcim_org_info o WHERE o.`status` = 1 ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT o.name as org_name,o.org_number, o.platformlist_ico ,o.org_isstaticproduct, CASE o.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade, o.min_profit, o.max_profit, o.min_dead_line, o.max_dead_line, o.dead_line_min_self_defined, o.dead_line_max_self_defined, (select count(1) from tcim_product p where p.org_number = o.org_number AND p.`status` = 1 ) as usableProductNums, a.* from tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * from tcrm_org_acct_rel r where r.user_id=#{userId} ) a on o.org_number = a.org_number where 1=1
and a.org_account is not null
and a.org_account is null
SELECT count(1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info t ON r.org_number = t.org_number WHERE r.user_id =#{userId}
SELECT count(1) FROM tcim_org_info
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tcrm_org_acct_rel
id,
user_id,
org_number,
org_account,
org_account_type,
is_invested,
is_new_user,
creat_time,
update_time,
#{id},
#{userId},
#{orgNumber},
#{orgAccount},
#{orgAccountType},
#{isInvested},
#{isNewUser},
#{creatTime},
#{updateTime},
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} and r.org_number=#{platFromNumber}
SELECT org_account FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.user_id =#{userId} and r.org_number=#{orgNo}
SELECT user_id FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel r WHERE r.org_account =#{thirdOrgAccount} and r.org_number=#{orgNo}
SELECT log_id FROM tcrm_investor_login_log WHERE user_id =#{userId} order by create_time desc limit 1
SELECT org_number orgNumber,name orgName FROM tcim_org_info WHERE `status` = #{status} AND org_isstaticproduct = 1
SELECT org_number orgNumber,name orgName FROM tcim_org_info WHERE `status` = 1
mapper.update: update tcrm_org_acct_rel set is_invested=1 where user_id=#{userId} and org_number=#{orgNumber}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.org_number, t.`name`, t.org_account, t.org_password, t.recommend, t.`status`, t.top, t.homepage_sort,
CASE t.grade WHEN 1 THEN 'B' WHEN 2 THEN 'BB' WHEN 3 THEN 'BBB' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 5 THEN 'AA' WHEN 6 THEN 'AAA' ELSE '未定义' END grade,
t.org_url, t.contact, t.representative, t.context, t.capital, t.city, t.icp_filing, t.up_time, t.min_profit, t.max_profit, t.min_dead_line, t.max_dead_line, t.trusteeship, t.org_profile, t.org_security, t.platform_ico, t.platformlist_ico, t.platform_detail_img, t.business_license, t.min_fee_ratio, t.max_fee_ratio, t.org_fee_ratio, t.org_product_url, t.org_usercenter_url, t.org_bind_user_url, t.org_userbalance_url, t.org_user_exist_url, t.org_fee_type, t.org_isstaticproduct, t.org_advertisement, t.org_advertisement_url, t.org_investigation_report, t.org_investigation_report_url, t.org_margin, t.org_advantage, t.org_tag, t.org_product_tag, t.org_invest_strategy, t.org_planner_strategy, t.org_invest_tag, t.org_planner_tag, t.org_planner_product_tag, t.org_honor, t.org_gray_status, t.org_newest_img, t.org_joint_type,
t.org_debenture_transfer, t.org_bid_security, t.org_security_mode, t.org_website_records, t.org_contact_details, t.pc_platform_img, t.pc_platform_list_img, t.pc_platform_detail_img, t.diff_fee_ratio, t.cooperation_end_url,
t1.tid, t1.org_icon, t1.org_membergrade, t1.org_membername, t1.org_describe FROM tcim_org_info t LEFT JOIN tcim_org_memberinfo t1
ON t.id = t1.orgid WHERE t.org_number = #{orgNumber}
SELECT IFNULL(is_new_user,1) FROM tcrm_org_acct_rel WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND org_number=#{orgNumber}
SELECT org_number orgNumber, org_fee_type orgFeeType, org_amount_limit orgAmountLimit, org_investdeadline_limit orgInvestdeadlineLimit FROM tcim_org_info WHERE org_number = #{orgNumber}
SELECT org_number orgNumber,name orgName FROM tcim_org_info WHERE `status` = #{status}
mapper.update:
UPDATE tcim_org_info
recommend = #{recommend},
top = NULL,
top = #{top},
homepage_sort = NULL
homepage_sort = #{homepageSort}
org_number = #{orgNumber}
